## JsonRpcNotification interface

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Specifies notification headers as per [JSON-RPC 2.0 Specification](https://www.jsonrpc.org/specification)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface JsonRpcNotification<NotificationName = string, NotificationParams = any> 
```

## Remarks

Note one difference to the JSON-RPC spec is that notifications originate from the wallet (i.e. the Server, not the Client).

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [jsonrpc](./iframe-channel-provider.jsonrpcnotification.jsonrpc.md) | '2.0' | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Spec version |
|  [method](./iframe-channel-provider.jsonrpcnotification.method.md) | NotificationName | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Generic type of the Notification name |
|  [params](./iframe-channel-provider.jsonrpcnotification.params.md) | NotificationParams | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Generic type of the Notification parameters |
